pages.title: Loom
pages.text: In order to make things that use cloth or wool, you need a loom.$(br2)Looms take three different inputs: $(item)Jute, Wool Yarn, and String $().
String is obtained from Vanilla spiders, which you'll find underground. Jute is obtained from the Jute plant. Wool yarn requires a slightly more involved process (see next page)
To get wool to use with the spindle, craft a Sheepskin with a knife.
The spindle is needed to process wool from a sheep. First, craft an unfired spindle with a clay and a stick.
Then, fire it in a pit kiln

pages.title: Wool Yarn
pages.text: Craft the spindle with the Wool to make wool yarn. Now we're ready to make some magic happen.

In order to fill the loom, you need different amounts of material$(br2)Wool Yarn: 16$(br)String: 24$(br)Jute Fiber: 12$(br)Wool Cloth: 4$(br2) Hold down right click to weave. This will produce cloth if you used string, and a vanilla wool block if you used cloth.
